Description.div: Pass ShipmentKey or pass ShipmentNo, ShipNode and SellerOrganizationCode to identify the shipment.

Attribute.Name: CreateNewShipment
Attribute.Description: CreateNewShipment can be passed as Y by the user exit to indicate that the application must create a new shipment as are no existing shipments to which one could consolidate with. Not passing Y would mean, that the Shipment selected by the user exit would be used to consolidate with.

Attribute.Name: PerformESPCheck
Attribute.Description: PerformESPCheck can be passed as Y by the user exit to indicate that the application must perform ESP checks when new shipments are not being created. Not passing Y would mean, that the Shipment selected by the user exit would be not go through ESP checks.
